  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x116
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x115.88
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,21.44) size 784x86.44

        LayoutText {#text} at (148,0) size 488x37
          text run at (148,0) width 488: "<BODY style=\"text-align: center\">"
